item.title: Integration Test
item.description: Integration Test part1 What is Integration Test Integration test is kinds of test suite which performs end to end testing of your application. Let’s try to understand with an example what includes in end to end testing. For example if we have microservice which is serving APIs for customer’s crud and maintain data in to postgres database. Now as part of Integration test we will cover following test cases for each api endpoint.
